name: autonomous-delegation-daemon
description: Repository-agnostic autonomous task delegation daemon for AI CLIs

scripts.lint: node --check bin/autodelegate-daemon.mjs && node --check bin/autodelegate-init.mjs && node --check bin/autodelegate-submit.mjs && node --check bin/autodelegate-status.mjs
scripts.test: node bin/autodelegate-daemon.mjs --help && node bin/autodelegate-init.mjs --help && node bin/autodelegate-submit.mjs --help && node bin/autodelegate-status.mjs --help

author: Bakary Potter
